executable.title: SkeletonTool
executable.description: This is a CLI module that can be bundled in an extension

parameters.label: IO

integer.name: nDegrees
integer.label: Edge Criterion
integer.description: Minimal number of mesh edges separating two generator points of a VD face for it to be considered (try 2, 3)

double.name: xPrune
double.label: Pruning Factor
double.description: Prune the mesh using factor X.XX (try 2.0). The pruning algorithm deletes faces in the VD for which the ratio of the geodesic distance between the generating points and the euclidean distance between these points is less than X.XX

integer.name: nComp
integer.label: Max Conn.Component
integer.description: Take at most N connected components of the skeleton

double.name: xSearchTol
double.label: Tolerance
double.description: Tolerance for the inside/outside search algorithm (default 1e-6). Use lower values if holes appear in the skeleton. Set to zero to disable pruning of outside vertices

integer.name: nBins
integer.label: Quadric Clustering Bins
integer.description: Postprocess skeleton with VTK's quadric clustering filter. The effect is to reduce the number of vertices in the skeleton. Parameter n_bins is the number of bins in each dimension. A good value for n_bins is 20-50
